# AXB

## Format

- 1st character: phoneme (d, t)
- 2nd character: language (s “Spanish”, e “English”)
- 3rd character: “talker” (a, b, c)
- 4th character: repetition (1, 2)

- We are interested in whether the participants can distinguish English /d/ from Spanish /t/
